content: these clothes and accessories are made to fit the long legged bunny bear and cat they mix and match between the 3 animals all of the clothes are made in a simple pull on style no closures the pattern includes a dress shirt pants overalls the pants and overalls can both be made long or short a hat a messenger bag and a purse this pattern is available free on the 5 little monsters website or available for purchase in the long legged animals ebook which includes all 3 animals plus the clothes and accessories for them to wear
